description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Le Monde, histoire de tous les peuples depuis les temps les plus reculés jusqu'à nos jours, par MM. Saint Prosper, de Saurigny, Duponchel, le baron Korff, Belloc et l'abbé Martin, revue et continuée par M. E. de Lostalot-Bachoué. Édition illustrée, etc" Author: CASSÉ DE SAINT-PROSPER, André Augustin. Contributor: BELLOC - Membre de l'Institut Historique Contributor: DUPONCHEL, Augustin Amédée. Contributor: HOUZÉ, A. Contributor: KORF, Modest Andreevich - Count Contributor: LOSTALOT-BACHOUÉ, E. de. Contributor: Martin, Guillaume - abbé Contributor: SAURIGNY, de. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9008.f.5." Volume: 04 Page: 334 Place of Publishing: Paris Date of Publishing: 1858 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000626225 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
